기본정보.수업목표:
Through Polymer Chemistry 1, we are going to learn about not only polymer synthetic methods, such as radical polymerizaiton, anionic polymerization, cationic polymerization, and coordination polymerization, but also the definition of polymers and their applications. This class is mainly given in English even though professor is going to give objectives and summary both in Korean and in English.

Therefore, students can learn about polymer synthesis as well as improve their English abilities in writing, reading and listening.

The content of this class will include the current research trends related with this class. 
The class will be slow down when the important concept is delivered.
